website_summaries.verdict: Nice looking pet recovery collar that is offered in a couple of different colors aimed to fit smaller animals.
pros: Much smaller than the traditional plastic cones you'll receive at the vet's office, which is nice for small animals
Consists of a soft foam material that's more comfortable than a traditional cone
cons: Too small to prevent a persistent pet from licking its stitches

customer_reviews.title: This is a lovely collar for protecting the front half ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely collar for protecting the front half of a dog under about 20 pounds. It will not keep them from licking at the back half of their body. It launders well and while they are unhappy when you initially put it on, they adjust very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cone catastrophe!
customer_reviews.text: Well... this was a disaster... Kitty could still get to the wound on his tail. But that wasn’t even the biggest problem! Apparently it really messed with his spatial awareness while he was in the litter box. He stepped in his poop, COMPLETELY FREAKED OUT and flung it everywhere!!! All over the walls... then tracked it throughout the house as he ran around in a frenzy! It’s a little comical now... anyways I hope that issue is unique to my cat and doesn’t happen to anyone else!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the rigid plastic ones that the vet gives you! Our cat is very large (18lbs) and this fits him fine. He did manage to get it off once and twice he has got one of his front paws stuck in it. He is able to eat and drink fine with it on. He is not happy about it but it is still so much better than the traditional cones! You also can easily switch the direction of it. I prefer it flipped back— I think it is easier for him to eat and drink yet still is effective in preventing him from licking his wound.
customer_reviews.author: MomWithAnAmazonProblem

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for pet - could be longer
customer_reviews.text: My puppies were comfortable in these, but the cones don't stick out far enough to prevent them from getting to their incisions. The cones are made well, and are a nice, padded thickness (not too thin, but also not heavy). They're cute when worn. The reason for only three stars is the product could be greatly improved if shaped so the cones stick out further, and if some additional velcro areas were added to create a better fit. I used these on two toy poodles, and both puppies have small necks (if that is helpful to know).
customer_reviews.author: Another Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very light and least constricting for the cat's daily life. It hardly gets dirty(I have had numerous other kinds of colors and they got dirty and stained so much from the cat licking inside of the collar.) and my "severely allergic to unknown" medical foster-cat from the shelter seems to be bothered the least with this orange collar. I am ordering another one right now.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat after he had surgery on his abdomen. The plastic cone they gave us made it hard for him to be able to do his normal routine while protecting his incision. I thought the softer, more flexible cone would make life easier for him. And it did!.......................for about an hour. Through vigorous playtime (he's 6 months old), the Velcro started to come off and he would escape out of it fairly easily. It was a nice thing to use to give him a break from the harder cone, but it is in no way a replacement as I had hoped. This product is a great idea, but needs tweaking..maybe use snaps instead of velcro????
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: It's cute, but it does nothing to keep my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but it does nothing to keep my 12 lb maltese from licking his back paw. He has a growth on his back left paw (vet said it was a benign growth that many dogs his age get), and occasionally it gets irritated enough that he licks it raw. I bought this to keep him from licking during allergy season. He doesn't mind wearing it at all.... because it doesn't stop him from doing anything he wants. It's just decoration now. Edit: added stars to original review because customer service is top notch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Wu

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My cat needed an e collar after have a cyst removed from his head. Rather than pay $15 for the hard plastic cone of shame, I opted for a soft fabric cone. I leave it on him when I go to work and it’s still on him when I get home in the afternoon, so I am pleased. I like that it’s not as uncomfortable as the plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have now ordered 6 of these for chronic issue with h our cat. Keeps him from hurting himself and a great value. (6 are needed to change out through the day to be washed.)
customer_reviews.author: Kim in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: My cat used for this cone for a chronic skin condition for a number of months. The plastic cone was irritating her and she couldn’t sleep. I needed something which could last for a longer period of time, easy to clean and comfortable. She did great with no issues. She’s a senior and wasn’t feisty with trying to remove it. Loved the yellow color with her yellow eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Klark

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my dog needed. She has a huge skin tag behind her ear that she scratched completely off, exposing raw, blood skin. This e-collar is a life saver as it prevents doggie from getting to the ear, yet it's soft and flexible. She sleeps, eats, does everything in it as she normally would. Not to mention, the bright, happy yellow makes her look like a little flower.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Long

customer_reviews.title: Collar fit perfectly and works great. I have a small yorkie with a scratching ...
customer_reviews.text: Collar fit perfectly and works great. I have a small yorkie with a scratching problem so she's constantly wearing a cone. The trouble with the regular plastic cones is that due to her small size it's hard for her to eat while wearing them, and taking it off and putting it on constantly is a hassle. This cone solves that by being able to flip it "inside out" while she eats and flipping it back when she's done without taking it off
customer_reviews.author: Andres R

customer_reviews.title: Probably works better on a dog than a cat
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK for my cat, who was recovering from surgery on his paw. POSITIVES: Quality of the product, comfort, easy to put on and take off, cleans well, flexible. NEGATIVES: it's not see through, so it impairs peripheral vision. My cat still managed to get to the paw if/when he wanted to, but then again, he was able to do that with the plastic cone the vet put on him.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia G.

customer_reviews.title: That worked just fine and still protected the area that was in need ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 11 lb cat and it worked well. The flexibility of the fabric was less irritating to Cornelius Humperdinkleberry ( :-D ) than the traditional plastic cones. Only problem he had was it getting in the way when trying to eat out of his dish. When it was time to eat, I'd just flip it backwards so that the wide end was down over his body. That worked just fine and still protected the area that was in need of healing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the traditional cone!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our sweet girl had knee surgery, and the traditional cone was so uncomfortable for her. Being that she is required to wear a cone for two weeks, we started searching for something more comfortable. We decided to try the Sungrow Comy Cone, and are so glad we did. She can finally lay her head down!! It is super easy to clean, just wipe with a damp cloth. It is definitely wider than the traditional cone, but I can tell it is much more comfortable for our girl.
customer_reviews.author: SMully

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable & looks comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Barbara was using the plastic cone collar we got from the vet and we knew on day 1 that she couldn’t wear that for the time they wanted, so we bought this one. Our cat feels comfortable and looks like herself again. It’s easy to take off/put on and there’s no threading through a collar with this Velcro version. Great purchase, she seems happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog can see where he's going lol
customer_reviews.text: I got this one to replace the plastic one from the vet and it looks a lot more comfortable! This one looks/feels more stiff than another one he already has, but it also fits my little dog perfectly while being able to walk around and not trip over it. He also had no issues falling asleep with it and did not come off. The price was very reasonable too, so I highly recommend it for smaller dogs/cats! (There are cats bigger than my dog lol.)
customer_reviews.author: Farida Burenbeiya

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Yet Protective
customer_reviews.text: Having been sent home from surgery with a traditional hard cone of shame, my kitty and therefore I am so much happier with this soft collar that bends in either direction. He can feed himself, accomplish selective grooming, use the litter box and move about more comfortably without scaring himself by loudly banging into doorways and furniture. This collar is easily cleaned with a sponge if food or liquid medicine lands on it and it is making my kitty’s convalescence very much easier. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ocarol

customer_reviews.title: Finally a collar that works for kitties
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my cat had surgery. He hates the usual plastic collar and always finds a way out. He never tried to get out of this nice soft collar. It absolutely served it's purpose. And it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Zirkelbach

customer_reviews.title: Think it's ok
customer_reviews.text: So, it's been two days. I like that my cat doesn't hurt himself, when he smacks into basically everything. And , it's a built in pillow for him 🤟 yellow, is very yellow but black was ten bucks more 🙄 it's a better version of the cone of shame.
customer_reviews.author: LuvVdubbs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My cat is quite small and the hard cones the vet supplies seem to be more clunky and hard to navigate with it on. This comfy cone is wonderful! Prevents licking his wounds and he seems to have adjusted well to the comfy cone. I will recommend this product to all my friends and family with small dogs and cats.
customer_reviews.author: Misty H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a cat
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had a skin infection, which required her to be in this cone for about a week or so. She didn't like it, but this worked much better than the paper cone our vet gave us. Super easy to put on, and flexible enough that our cat had no problem moving around freely.
customer_reviews.author: Casey P. Kampf

customer_reviews.title: Cozy E-collar
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the medium for our 6 month old, 7 lb chihuahua. Perfect for after spaying. It was surprising how easily she got comfortable in it. No problem sleeping, walking, or playing with it on. She could still lick herself a bit but she could not reach the wound area. I needed to trim the velcro area a bit so it didn't rub against her neck.
customer_reviews.author: DelawareDave

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for cat after spay surgery
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried the cone would be too small or flexible after my cat was spayed, but it’s been perfect. She can’t get to her wound, but she’s able to walk around just fine, and she’s very comfortable sleeping in it. It’s easy and quick to get on/off. I can’t think of any reason why not to get this cone, or to still get those old hard plastic cones. I hope it helps your pets like it helped my mine!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Stavran

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: It was what I was looking for, easy to use, effective and apparently comfortable for my cat. Does not interfere with eating from her bowl or drinking from the fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Add some sunshine to your difficult time
customer_reviews.text: My cat came home from amputation surgery and they sent him with the standard hard plastic that was too tight and looked painful. He also couldn’t eat or drink well with out constant attention. I loved this. It’s hilarious on but it also folds back making it way to eat and still protects his incision
customer_reviews.author: M. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Good for cats too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my cats to protect their face when I rub diatomaceous earth into their skin.bodies to help with flea control. It works quite well for that, is easy to clean/wipe down bc it’s plastic.
customer_reviews.author: risingSun770

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, stress free pet recovery conr
customer_reviews.text: This was Sooo much better than the cone the vet gave us. Our older cat had to have surgery to remove a mass on her shoulder. This cone was flexible and comfortable enough that she could reach food and water and she was able to do all her normal activities ( like going in her covered litter box) . I bought a second one when we had our new cat spayed.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Allen Phillips

customer_reviews.title: So grateful for this product
customer_reviews.text: I seriously LOVE this product. My poor cat has to wear a cone for a long time and I felt beyond awful until I got this. This cone is super lightweight and when he lays down it's so soft he uses it like a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Chase M. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase for our large Maine Coon cat after surgery. She didn't seem to mind the soft cone at all and it kept her from getting at her stitches. She could sleep and eat comfortably too.
customer_reviews.author: James Roos

customer_reviews.title: Not a fit
customer_reviews.text: Not a fit for my dog and what I needed it for. He could still get to a sore he had on his tummy I returned the item
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 minute before it came off.
customer_reviews.text: Velcro is no match for my cat. Glad it works for some!
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: Cute EC
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute. But size is little bit small
customer_reviews.author: Sakurako

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: It rubbed the fur off my cat's neck. Very disappointed by that, but otherwise it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Light
customer_reviews.text: I used the measurement chart and it fits my dog very well. It’s nice and light and the Velcro is strong. It’s so much better than the hard plastic cones.
customer_reviews.author: USC Fan

customer_reviews.title: My cat cant take this off, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft, but unfortunately my cat finds a way out of this collar, so it's useless. Or he'll flip it down like a little cape.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let anyone tell you these are as good as plastic
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let anyone tell you these are as good as plastic. If your dog had surgery don’t don’t do it. Mine could easily reach. For a minor problem maybe it helps a little
customer_reviews.author: GCS18

customer_reviews.title: Cute.  Comfy.  Not a cone.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t stop my dog from being able to get to his leg and lick the wound. Has no real structure so it flips back. I was trying to not use the big plastic cone that came from the vet but it looks like they use it for a reason. It does the job, even if your pet is miserable with it (lol). Didn’t work for me. Maybe for a teacup size dog....
customer_reviews.author: Amy Knox

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable At All
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, but the material is way too flimsy. My cat licked through it in a matter of hours. It didn't even last a day.
customer_reviews.author: PlayMsTea4me

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than the plastic ones! My cat can actually sleep and do every day things while wearing it! It’s padded and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Soft and perfect, I was able to cut the collar a bit so it would fit my cat more comfortably. She was happier with this collar than any other design. Easy to wash & it’s pretty
customer_reviews.author: night owl

customer_reviews.title: Cutest cone I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I love this cone. If he runs into something it doesn’t get stuck like a plastic cone would. I bought this to keep him from licking a hot spot on his neck and it has word wonderfully. He doesn’t care for it, but his hot spot is so much better
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use and Clean
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this for my cat who had some healing chin acne. It’s easy to remove and clean and less bulky than a plastic cone but there were some cons. The Velcro ends when placed together are a bit bulky and tend to move t the front of my cats face throughout the day which bothers him a lot. The other downside is that it’s become very snagged from my cat with back claws attempting to scratch. I hadn’t considered this when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great color for itchy pets
customer_reviews.text: This collar is very effective for my cat who suffered from dermatitis. He can’t scratch his face or bite his body when he has this on. The collar is light weight and soft so it’s more comfortable for long term use. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because he can take it off if he really tries but if you safety pin the collar that problem is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but my dog freaked about all three of the collars I tried. If he had this on from the beginning I think he would have liked it too.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy for your pet
customer_reviews.text: Made my cat's life easier for two weeks after surgery. He hated the hard plastic one from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: ruthwklein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it is made of soft cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Works great on one cat, not at all on another
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my girl kitty from scratching when her allergies are bad, but every time I put it on my boy kitty he finds a way out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my medium size cat
customer_reviews.text: Great size and perfect fabric. My cat actually liked it! He found how to rest his head on it and was evident that it was ot that invasive and limiting.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fit 8lbs pomeranian perfectly! She is able to eat, drink and sleep comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: frequentshopper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy content kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat seems more active in this collar. When he was in the plastic one the vet gave me, he was lying around most of the time. He’s less afraid of bumping into things because it’s not rigid. It’s lighter weight and soft but sturdy shape seems more comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Akemi Haigood

customer_reviews.title: This was the only soft cone he liked and he’s very finicky
customer_reviews.text: Was able to prevent my dog from scratching his ear so it could heal. This was the only soft cone he liked and he’s very finicky. I gave it fours because I had to buy Velcro to attach to the cone,since the Velcro on the cone didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy. My 12 lb rat terrier had no problem turning around and still licking his spot on his foot.
customer_reviews.author: babydogterrier

customer_reviews.title: I'm just glad we didn't have to use it for too long
customer_reviews.text: It is soft and does the job for our dog. I'm just glad we didn't have to use it for too long. It is so sad seeing our dog in the cone of shame.
customer_reviews.author: ImagineThat

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and soft seems a little small though
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and this is the softest and the cutest of the several I decided to try. It definitely is the smallest.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer JanR

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size
customer_reviews.text: Order up a size. We measured our dogs neck and these were still way too small
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy S

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect cone for my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cone for my fur baby. Ever since he was diagnosed with feline lymphoma he developed multiple itchy bumps on his neck. This made me put him in a cone 24/7. It was a struggle to find a durable and lightweight cone. The size small is perfect for large breed cats. It doesn't touch his food bowl when he eats and you can wash it when it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: Way too flexible and soft. All my dog had to do was push it up against the couch and it bent backwards and he could get at his incision
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, well made and a welcome relief for our feline
customer_reviews.author: PhxReview

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my 6lbs Maltese. It allows her to still drink/eat her food/water. It is also comfortable enough for her to sleep in. Would highly recommend for small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: where there's a will.......
customer_reviews.text: Nova, my cat, is too smart for his own good. He figured out that he could 'scratch, lick' himself right through the collar. We go through lots and lots of collar. Thanks for asking.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Smith-Hookey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is cute. However rather floppy. Does not stand up to keep her from reaching incision
customer_reviews.author: kit kat

customer_reviews.title: It is a great idea, but it doesn't do the job
customer_reviews.text: This product did not keep my Pomeranian from liking his wounds after surgery. It was flimsy and would not stay up in the cone shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kelicoclay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and my cat in comfortable can see were he’s going . Much better then the doctor plastic cone .
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great with my small dog, preventing her from hurting herself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat doesn’t mind it
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for everyday wear and it doesn’t bother my cat too much. The only con is that he can slip it off easily!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's soft and I can bring it down ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8.5lb cat so he didn't have to wear the plastic cone of shame from the Vet's. I like that it's soft and I can bring it down over his shoulders when eating but bring it back into proper position for the rest of the time. It's quite lose around the neck and at one point (not sure how) he got his front leg thru the hole. I'm going to probably have to add a bit more Velcro so I can tighten it a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Sahra

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but doesn't work well to keep the dog from reaching areas on his stomach. Too flexible
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft around the neck and she could eat and drink easily!
customer_reviews.author: kathy  grillo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Work well, comfortable, better than the plastic one, my dog can eat and walk well.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but works
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy. Our cat got the cone off a couple times. Other than that it’s been stylish and hopefully more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's light and the overall size is good for smaller pets(8lb cat), only thing is neck part is not tight enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought a plastic one from a pet store, it was too heavy and the the collar part is too long for my 8lb cat to reach any food. This one is already a lot lighter and smaller, only thing is that it's not wrapped around his neck tight enough. All I needed to do is put on some more velcro tapes so that it can wrap around his neck tighter, then it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Too soft.
customer_reviews.text: Too soft. Dog can still reach all areas to bite lick and scratch himself :(
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: SunGrow Dog Recovery Cone, 9-10 Inches, Comfortable Neck Pillow with Adjustable Enclosures, Soft Donut Collar After Neuter Surgery, Yellow Color, M Size, 1-Pc
feature_bullets: AN EXCELLENT ALTERNATIVE TO FIRM, UGLY LAMPSHADE-STYLE RECOVERY COLLAR --- The cushioned soft collar of the SunGrow Pet Cute Recovery Cone is one fine alternative to the recovery collar cones of yesteryears. Your pet roams around the house looking even more cute and cuddly with this SunGrow cone. Perfect for the happy, post-surgery selfies with your poochie.

GREAT FOR DOGS & CATS FOR A STRESS-FREE RECOVERY --- For injured pets, it’s instinctive to bite or lick annoying spot post the surgery. This cute pet cone by SunGrow is ideal for this situation. The collar restrains pets from scratching their hotspot, wounds or stitches. It also works great for pets with skin conditions and as an effective grooming cone. It heals your pet comfortably.

ENSURES MAXIMUM COMFORT & VISIBILITY --- The SunGrow Cone collar doesn’t interfere with your pets’ peripheral vision or in their ability to drink and eat. In fact, they rest more comfortably due to the soft fabric edge. They can lay their head in any position wearing the cone.

EASY TO USE, MAINTAIN & HIGHLY DURABLE --- This pet medical cone by SunGrow is made of soft foam making it strong and super light. It is water-resistive which makes it washable and easy to wash. The soft fabric is lightweight yet highly durable.

ADJUSTABLE HOOK LOOP FASTENER ENCLOSURES --- When you put this SunGrow collar around your pet’s neck, you can conveniently adjust the collar size with the magic Hook Loop Fastener. So, tighten or loosen as required. The dogs and cats adapt to the surroundings easily and faster wearing this cone. But, ensure you have measured the right circumference of your dog’s neck. This medical cone is ideal for necks measuring 9-10 inches.
